overview: STEELETTO tells the short story of drag queen Steeletto. While performing at her local bar is hounded by a gentleman whoâ€™s had a bit too much to drink. After declining his advances he chooses to no longer give her the option to say no. Steeletto seeks revenge with help of her gal pal Mindy. Hell hath no fury like a man in a wig.
title: Steeletto
